TextView.android:text: “From forty-one we take twenty-seven. That leaves fourteen”. Her eyes filled with tears, and her thin, pretty little nose was shining with perspiration. Poor little child! “I only took money once,” she said in a trembling voice. “I took three rubles from your wife... never anything more”. “Did you now? You see, I never made a note of it. Take three from fourteen. That leaves eleven. Here’s your money, my dear. Three, three, three... one and one. Take it, my dear”. I gave her the eleven rubles. With trembling fingers she took them and slipped them into her pocket. “Merci,” she whispered. I jumped up, and began pacing up and down the room. I was in a furious temper. “Why did you say ‘merci?” I asked. “For the money”. “Don’t you realize I’ve been cheating you? I steal your money, and all you can say is ‘merci”!’ “In my other places they gave me nothing”. “ They gave you nothing! Well, no wonder! I was playing a trick on you – a dirty trick...
